DOC.brief_summary: The optimal dose iodine base contrast agent use contrast-enhanced spectral mammography ( CESM ) unknown . If CESM , perform low dose iodine base contrast agent , visualize tumor comparable CESM regular dose contrast agent , patient receive less contrast agent CESM future thereby risk less side effect contrast agent . In order study whether CESM remain unchanged small amount contrast administration , second CESM exam perform within one week first alternative amount contrast , either 80 % , 60 % 40 % original contrast dose . The setting CESM unit remain unchanged .
